name: The Cadet Files: Scene Unseen
description:
Against Time Challenging Mystery Solving Game







The Cadet Files: Scene Unseen is a unique interactive detective game crafted for enthusiasts of mystery and detective genres. As a trainee agent on the verge of graduation, you dive into a world of intricate crimes and captivating mysteries. This game blends critical thinking, observation, and interactive storytelling, offering an immersive experience for players of all levels.



Engaging Detective Gameplay: Solve complex crimes using your primary tool – a tablet loaded with clues and puzzles.
Diverse Scenarios: Each level presents a distinct crime scene, demanding sharp observation and deductive reasoning.
Interactive Puzzle Solving: Uncover hidden objects, capture significant photographs, and solve challenging puzzles.
Progressive Difficulty: As you advance, the puzzles and scenarios grow more complex, mirroring an agent’s journey from novice to master detective.
Immersive Storytelling: Engage in a narrative where each decision and discovery leads to new paths and outcomes.
